name: Fire Arrow Plus
description: Fire Arrow and Fire Arrow X are time attack style shooters with a heavy emphasis on scoring. Otherwisely, you can call them coffee break shmups.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista and higher Processor: 1,8 Ghz Single Core Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Pixel and Vertex Shader 2.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: May not run correctly with Intel HD integrated graphics units.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista and higher Processor: 2 Ghz Single Core Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Pixel and Vertex Shader 3.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: May not run correctly with Intel HD integrated graphics units.
